mapper.sql: a.city AS "city", a.woman_num AS "womanNum", a.man_num AS "manNum", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_sex_num( city, woman_num, man_num, longitude, latitude ) VALUES ( #{city}, #{womanNum}, #{manNum}, #{longitude}, #{latitude} )
mapper.update: UPDATE login_sex_num SET city = #{city}, woman_num = #{womanNum}, man_num = #{manNum}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude} WHERE id = #{id}
